page.title: 07RECREATION
page.content: { Survey questions. 1.Their favourite recreation. 2.Their worst recreation. 3.Why do they do the first recreation.{ NAME.} {GLENN T }1.Cycling 2.Going to bed early 3.For enjoyment. {MIKE H}1.Girls 2.Watching Danger Mouse 3.For enjoyment. {GARETH E}1. Meeting girls 2.Chess 3.To use up the time. {WHAT RECREATION REALY IS Recreation is games & hobbies done in spare time. {1}Type of recreation and something about it.{Running For running you need shorts, soft athletic shoes & a T_shirt. Running can be a very strenuous recreation or it can be a very relaxing recreation. {Michael Harrison '''''''''''''''''
